Name: Demon Tamer
About the game: Demons and beasts have taken over a small island country. A mage survives the onslaught and learns of a way to tame the beasts and demons. Using this power, he sets out to get back his country. In this RPG, you can tame monsters and demons to have them join your party. Combine different monsters and spells in dynamic turn-based combat. Craft powerful accessories and weapons to customize your attacks.
